Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.controller

Class TeamController

java.lang.Object
com.IGallinari.LastGame.controller.TeamController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/team") @CrossOrigin public class TeamController extends Object
Controller class for handling team-related operations. This class is annotated with @RestController to indicate that it is a controller providing RESTful services. The base mapping for the endpoints is set using @RequestMapping("/team"). Cross-origin requests are allowed through the @CrossOrigin annotation.

  • Method Details

    • getTeams

      @PostMapping("/getTeams") public TeamsResponse getTeams(@RequestBody TokenRequest tokenRequest)
      Endpoint for retrieving information about teams.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request object containing the user's authentication token.
      Returns:
      The TeamsResponse containing information about teams or an error response.

    • getTeamDetails

      @PostMapping("/getTeamsDetails") public TeamDetailsResponse getTeamDetails(@RequestBody TokenRequest tokenRequest, @RequestParam int idTeam, @RequestParam int season)
      Endpoint for retrieving details about a specific team.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request object containing the user's authentication token.
      idTeam - The identifier of the team for which details are requested.
      season - The season for which team details are requested.
      Returns:
      The TeamDetailsResponse containing details about a specific team or an error response.

    • getCompareTeam

      @PostMapping("/getCompareTeams") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCompareTeam(@RequestBody TokenRequest tokenRequest, @RequestParam int idTeam1, @RequestParam int idTeam2, @RequestParam int season)
      Endpoint for comparing two teams.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request object containing the user's authentication token.
      idTeam1 - The identifier of the first team for comparison.
      idTeam2 - The identifier of the second team for comparison.
      season - The season for which teams are compared.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the comparison result or an error response.

    • getStandings

      @PostMapping("/getStandings") public StandingsResponse getStandings(@RequestBody TokenRequest tokenRequest, @RequestParam int season)
      Endpoint for retrieving standings information.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The request object containing the user's authentication token.
      season - The season for which standings information is requested.
      Returns:
      The StandingsResponse containing standings information or an error response.
